name: Thiago Rudiger
description:
Thiago is the CEO and cofounder of Tanssi Foundation, one of the core contributors of the Tanssi Network, an appchain infrastructure protocol designed to make deploying an appchain as simple as deploying a smart contract.

Thiago holds a degree in Computer Science from UFRJ. He spent the first five years of his career at Visagio consultancy and then over nine years as the head of operations at Squadra Investimentos, one of Brazil's leading independent equity funds.
